title: Emerald and Diamond Floral Necklace - A Contemporary Heirloom
materials: 18K White Gold. Features Pear-Shaped Emeralds of exceptional clarity and vibrant green hue
accented with brilliant-cut Diamonds. Total Emerald Weight: 8.19 carats (10 stones). Total Diamond weight: 6.0 carats (63 brilliant cut stones). Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: A modern take on the traditional Haaram. This necklace showcases a delicate floral design, with meticulously prong-set pear-shaped emeralds surrounded by intricate diamond detailing. The graduated design creates a flattering drape. The pendant design incorporates floral motifs and pear drop emeralds for a touch of tradition.
occasions: and high-end social gatherings. Also suitable for adding a touch of elegance to contemporary attire.
description: This exceptional piece combines the timeless allure of emeralds and diamonds with a modern design, making it a versatile addition to any jewelry collection. The brilliant sparkle and vibrant color will turn heads. A statement of refined taste and timeless elegance, this necklace is designed to be cherished for generations. The diamonds are of high clarity and brilliance, ensuring maximum sparkle.
